column1: Table 28. Nitrogen used on wheat, rate per fertilized acre receiving nitrogen, selected States
NA = Not available. Source data cover selected States in selected years; NA reflects State/crop/nutrient instances with no coverage.
1/  U.S. average is average of State's application rates, weighted by State's planted acres of winter, durum and spring wheat receiving fertilizer.
Source: Taylor (1964-93), NASS' Agricultural Chemical Usage (1994-2012).
